SEARCH
Module org.eclipse.persistence.nosql
Package org.eclipse.persistence.internal.eis.adapters.xmlfile

Class XMLFileInteraction

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.persistence.internal.eis.adapters.xmlfile.XMLFileInteraction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Interaction
public class XMLFileInteraction extends Object implements Interaction
Interaction to XML file JCA adapter. Executes the interaction spec against the file and DOM.
Since:
OracleAS TopLink 10g (10.0.3)

    • execute

      public Record execute(InteractionSpec spec, Record input) throws ResourceException
      Execute the interaction spec. The spec define the type of CRUD operation and the file/DOM to perform it on. The spec may also contain and XQuery/XPath to evaluate against the DOM. The input is used for insert/update to contain the data (DOM) to insert into the file.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Interaction
      Throws:
      ResourceException

    • execute

      public boolean execute(InteractionSpec spec, Record input, Record output) throws ResourceException
      Execute the interaction and set the output into the output record. Return true or false if the execute returned data (similar to row-count).
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Interaction
      Throws:
      ResourceException
